item.title: KBEngine and Unity
item.description: KBEngine This is a server engine. The most import concept is that each player is seen as a entity. The entity is splict into three parts: client, cell and base. The data could be transferred between these three part. Unity Unity is a client engine.

item.title: About me
item.description: Career I am a software engineer at Netease Game North America from July 2017. I get my bachelor degree at Xidian University, China. I studied at Shanghai Jiao Tong University pursuing doctor degree. However I give up after three years study. After that I apply a Master’s degree on computer Science at University of Southern California. Sport My favorite is soccer and Messi.

item.title: Build homepage with Hugo and Github
item.description: Why Homepage? I have build website lots of times, but I did’t insist on it.

item.title: Git Usage
item.description: SourceTree SourceTree is a very good tool. It provides an interface for diff and merge in git. It is also eazy to show the branch in the game. Basic command I have to understand the basic command so that when we click the button, we could know what happend behand it.
